lead_paragraph: Russian tennis player Svetlana Kuznetsova blamed politics for the decision to ban her country's track and field athletes from the Rio Olympics and said it was unfair to group them all together as doping cheats.

headline.print_headline: Politics Behind Russia's Athletics Ban, Says Kuznetsova
headline.main: Politics Behind Russia's Athletics Ban, Says Kuznetsova

snippet: Russian tennis player Svetlana Kuznetsova blamed politics for the decision to ban her country's track and field athletes from the Rio Olympics and said it was unfair to group them all together as doping cheats....
